item.description: https://www.facebook.... Description Spreading The Revolution one bar at a time………..Please join us in spreading the good Dr.’s word in this final push before the primary on January 10th. 7:00-8:30 Margarita’s 1037 Elm St Manchester NH *Please consider dining at our first stop for dinner or join ... at 8:00 the official kick off to our crawl 8:45-9:30 Shaskeen 909 Elm St *Specials: $3 Drafts $4 Guiness 9:45-10:15 Penuche's 96 Hanover St *Specials: All drafts $3 10:30-? McGarvey's 1097 Elm St *Specials: $1 off mixed drinks, .50 cents off beer **Extra Special: this is a karaoke bar, so bring your best diddy to dedicate to Dr Paul and the voters of NH. Best place to end a pub crawl ever!!! Wear your Ron Paul swag and enjoy drink specials at most participating bars. We do request that if you choose to exercise your 2nd Amendment right, it is in a concealed fashion. The press has been invited and we don’t want them to focus solely on open carrying, which we all know they would. We are trying to bring attention to the upcoming primary and let the voters know, Ron Paul is the dude!! Tip cards will be available to leave your servers to spread the message of H1139 “Keep Your Tips Act” sponsored by Dr. Paul. Free parking is available in parking lots on Lowell St. and the parking garage on Kasciusko/Elm St. which is right next to our last stop McGarvey’s.
item.name: Final Push Manch, NH Pub Crawl
